entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story. He is mentioned as observing Hepzibah's appearance.

entities.name: hepzibah smith
entities.description: A house-elf who is being helped by Hokey to get ready for a visitor. She is described as not looking lovely in Harry's opinion.

entities.name: hokey
entities.description: A house-elf who is helping Hepzibah get ready for a visitor. He is mentioned as lying through his teeth when asked about Hepzibah's appearance.

relationships.description: Harry observes Hepzibah's appearance and thinks she doesn't look lovely. (Excerpt: 'Hepzibah Smith looked a long way from lovely in his opinion.')
Hokey is helping Hepzibah get ready for a visitor. (Excerpt: 'Quick, quick, he's here, Hokey!' cried Hepzibah and the elf scurried out of the room.)
